name: blended-bsms-deadlines
description: Students clarify deadlines and double-count policy for the blended BS+MS program.

events.content: When do we apply for the blended BS+MS? Heard rumors about winter deadlines.
Submit the intent form by the fourth Friday of winter quarter (for fall admits). Spring cycle uses week 4 as well.
Remember you need 3 quarters left and at least a 3.0 GPA. Once admitted, you can double-count up to 12 unitsâ€”usually 400-level tech electives.
Do grad classes show up automatically?
Yes, once the Grad Studies office flips your plan code. Advisors will email the list of approved double-count courses.
